description: Visualize tractographic output from 3dTrackID, particularly in probabilistic mode.

in_fa.title: Input FA file
in_fa.description: FA values of the DT fitting, used to modulate the brightness of the RGB coloration.

in_v1.title: Input V1 file
in_v1.description: First eigenvector of the DT fitting. A unit vector volume with 3 components (0-1 range).

in_tracts.title: Input tracts file
in_tracts.description: The INDIMAP or PAIRMAP file output by 3dTrackID, specifying the subbrick if >1 (e.g., NAME_INDIMAP+orig'[0]').

in_ulay.title: Input underlay file
in_ulay.description: Optional underlay dataset for AFNI/SUMA viewing. Default is to use the FA dataset.

no_view.title: No view flag
no_view.description: Turn off auto-running of AFNI_SUMA commands to view the output immediately.

only_view.title: Only view flag
only_view.description: Only view the data with AFNI+SUMA, assuming the command has been run before.
